Translations.Text: allaha ta'ala kahi cukyo che ke be pujyo na banavo, pujya to phakata te ekalo ja che, basa! Tame sau maro ja dara rakho
akaso ane dharati para je kami pana che, badhum tenum ja che ane teni ja bandagi yogya che, sum to pana tame tena sivaya bijathi daro cho
tamari pase jetali pana ne'amato che badhum tene ja apelum che, hajum pana tamara para ko'i musibata avi jaya to teni ja samaksa phariyada karo cho
ane jyam tene te musibata tamara parathi dura kari didhi, tamara manthi ketalaka loko potana palanahara sathe bhagidara theravava lage che
ke amari apeli ne'amatono abhara na mane, sarum to thodoka phayado uthavi lo, chevate tamane khabara padi ja jase
ane jene janata pana nathi teno bhaga amari apeli roji'o manthi nakki karo cho, te allaha tamara a aropa vise jarura savala karase
ane te pavitra allaha mate balaki'o nakki kare che ane potana mate te je potani iccha anusara hoya
temana manthi ko'ine jyare balakini khabara apavamam ave to teno cahero phikko padi jaya che ane manamam sankoca anubhave che
a kharaba vatana karane lokothi chupa'ine phare che, vicare che ke sum tene apamanita tha'i, la'ine phare, athava tene matimam dabavi de, oha! Ketalo kharaba nirnaya kare che
akherata para imana na lavanaranum ja kharaba udaharana che, allaha mate to ghana ja ucca guno che te ghano vijayi ane hikamatavalo che

jo lokona papona karane allaha ta'ala temani pakada karato, to dharati para eka pana sajiva na raheto, parantu te to eka muddata sudhi dhila ape che, jyare temano te samaya avi pahonce che to te eka ksana pana na pachala ja'i sake che ane na to agala vadhi sake che
Ane te potana mate je pasanda nathi karata te allaha mate pasanda kare che ane te loko juththi vato varnave che, emana mate guna che, na, na, parantu temana mate aga che ane te jahannami che

allahana soganda, ame tamara pahelana loko tarapha pana payagambara mokalya, parantu setane temana kharaba karyone temana mate sanagari didha, te setana aje pana temano mitra ban'yo che ane temana mate du:Khadayi yatana che

a kitabane ame tamara para etala mate avatarita kari che ke tame temana mate te dareka vastune spasta kari do jemam te'o vivada kari rahya che ane a (kitaba) imanavala'o mate margadarsana ane krpa che
ane allaha akasa manthi pani varasavi tenathi dharatine tena mrtyu pachi jivita kari de che, kharekhara amam, te loko mate nisani che je sambhale
tamara mate dhoromam pana ghani sikhamana che ke ame tamane, tena petamam je kami pana che temanthi ja gobara ane lohini vaccethi sud'dha dudha pivadavi'e chi'e, je pinarana pacana mate halavum che
khajura ane draksana phalo vade tame saraba banavo cho, ane uttama roji pana, je loko bud'dhi dharave che, temana mate to amam moti nisani che
tamara palanahare madhamakhina hrdayamam a vata nakhi didhi ke parvatomam, vrksomam ane loko'e banaveli unci, unci velomam potanum ghara banava

ane dareka prakarana phalo khaya ane potana palanaharana sarala marga para pharya kara, temana peta manthi rangaberangi pinum nikale che, jena rango alaga-alaga che. Ane jemam loko mate ilaja che. Cintana karanara'o mate amam pana khuba ja moti nisani che

Ane dareka prakarana phalo khaya ane potana palanaharana sarala marga para pharya kara, temana peta manthi rangaberangi pinum nikale che, jena rango alaga-alaga che. Ane jemam loko mate ilaja che. Cintana karanara'o mate amam pana khuba ja moti nisani che

allaha ta'ala'e ja tamara manthi ekane bija para rojimam vadharo apyo che, basa! Jemane vadhare apavamam avyum che, te potani roji potani hethala kama karanara majurone nathi apata, e bhayathi ke te (jemane vadhare apyum che) ane te'o (majuro) banne sarakha tha'i jaya. To sum a loko allahani ne'amatono inkara kari rahya che

allaha ta'ala'e tamara mate tamara manthi ja tamari patni'onum sarjana karyum ane tamari patni'o dvara tamara mate tamara balako ane pautra peda karya ane tamane sari ane uttama vastu'o khava mate api, sum to pana loko asatya para imana lavase? Ane allaha ta'alani ne'amatone inkara karase
ane te allaha ta'alane chodine, te lokoni bandagi kare che je akaso ane dharati manthi temane kami pana roji nathi api sakata ane na to kami pana sakti dharave che
basa! Allaha ta'ala mate udaharano na apo, allaha ta'ala khuba sari rite jane che ane tame nathi janata
